name: Clear2Aviate LLC
about: Clear2Aviate LLC is a premier flight training school based in Michigan, dedicated to providing a tailored and comprehensive aviation education. Our objective is to prepare students to safely and proficiently fly, whether for business, pleasure, or a career in aviation. We offer accelerated programs for private, instrument, and commercial pilot certifications, with a focus on real-world skills and confidence-building. Our training includes ground school, flight missions, and cross-country training, ensuring students meet FAA requirements. With an above-average first-time practical exam pass rate, Clear2Aviate guides students through each stage of training to become safe, confident, and prepared pilots. We are committed to delivering a high-quality, personalized training experience that sets our students up for success in the skies.
services:

Simulator
